repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a grammatical text written by Appaya Dīkṣita. Blank folio after the guard folio has some lines in Granth script. Number 2 in the left margin. The folio is broken. The blank folio at the end has number 39 written in blue pencil and 34 is written in pink chalk.

msItem.title: Pāṇinīyavāda Nakṣatramāl
msItem.author: Appaya Dīkṣita

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum Vol 12 pp. 15-16. A manuscript from Raghunath madir Jammu, India is available on archive org RS 129. The manuscript is not mentioned in the New Catalogus Catalogorum. This manuscript has only 31 folio and is incomplete. It ends in the middle of the 13th chapter of the Pāṇinīyavāda and the inception of the manuscript is different than this manuscript.

msItem.explicit: (111v 4) t vivṛtiṣeyāyogena ?māṣṭmayamatasya nirākaraṇāt paribhāṣādvayasya virodhābhāvena nādṛtaḥ .
msItem.finalRubric: (111v 5) iti śrībhāradvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīmadvaitavidyācāryaśrīmahāvratayājīśrīmadappayadīkṣitasya kṛtau pāṇinīya (111v 6) vādanakṣatramālāyāṃ vipratiṣedhārthanirupaṇavādaḥ hariḥ om śrīyai namaḥ

support.p: Thick wooden guard folio. Back side of the guard folio has scratch marks and also small white spots. Front side has number 34 in pink color and sticker of number 39 printed and on same sticker number 83 written in blue pencil.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 2 blank folio and 111 written folio.

supportDesc.condition: Edges are broken. Wormholes in the middle of the folio. Left margin is damaged on 1v but folio number is visible.

handNote.desc: Clusters are not so clear to read. Confusedly written.

additions.desc: oṃ is visible. visarga mark and sign of i are visible so it could be (har)iḥ in the left margin of folio 1v.

binding.p: Red wool thread used to tie the folios.

encodingDesc.p: Question marks are used for illegible words. Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text: (1v 1) śubhamastu kavivāvādānantarametallekhanaṃ athayaduktamantarbutaikyajaropekṣentaraṃgeṇa kartavye (111v 4) t vivṛtiṣeyāyogena ?māṣṭmayamatasya nirākaraṇāt paribhāṣādvayasya virodhābhāvena nādṛtaḥ (111v 5) iti śrībhāradvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīmadvaitavidyācāryaśrīmahāvratayājīśrīmadappayadīkṣitasya kṛtau pāṇinīya (111v 6) vādanakṣatramālāyāṃ vipratiṣedhārthanirupaṇavādaḥ hariḥ om śrīyai namaḥ
